mapper.update:
update yd_message_ctc
ctc_id = #{ctcId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctc_img = #{ctcImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctc_name = #{ctcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ctc_price = #{ctcPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ctc_summary = #{ctcSummary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where message_ctc_id = #{messageCtcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yd_message_ctc set ctc_id = #{ctcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctc_img = #{ctcImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctc_name = #{ctcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctc_price = #{ctcPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ctc_summary = #{ctcSummary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where message_ctc_id = #{messageCtcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select message_ctc_id, ctc_id, ctc_img, ctc_name, ctc_price from yd_message_ctc where ctc_id=#{ctcId}
